acme-corp.business_info: We provide enterprise software solutions that help businesses streamline operations and increase productivity. Our flagship product is AcmeCRM - an all-in-one customer relationship management platform.

faqs.a: We serve retail, manufacturing, and professional services industries
We offer tiered pricing based on number of users and features needed
